text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Aleppo Governorate | native_name = مُحافظة حلب | native_name_lang = ar | settlement_type = Governorate | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_map = Aleppo in Syria (+Golan hatched).svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of Syria with Aleppo highlighted | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = Aleppo | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Syria | parts_type = Manatiq (Districts) | parts_style = para | p1 = 10 | established_title = | established_date = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Aleppo | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 18482 | population_footnotes = (Pre-Civil War) | population_total = 4867000 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Hussein Diab | blank_name_sec1 = Main language(s) | blank_info_sec1 = Arabic Syriac Kurdish Turkish Armenian | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = EEST | utc_offset1_DST = +3 | iso_code = SY-HL | website = Aleppo Governorate | footnotes = }} Aleppo Governorate ( ) is one of the fourteen governorates of Syria. Its capital is Aleppo. It is the most populous governorate in Syria. Category:Governorates of Syria
title: Aleppo Governorate
